Package io.jans.casa.misc

Class WebUtils

java.lang.Object
io.jans.casa.misc.WebUtils
public final class WebUtils extends Object
Provides utility methods for web-related functionalities. A good place to call these methods are ZK View Models or ZK page initiators, that is, a context where there is a ZK Execution.
Author:
jgomer

      Parameters:

    • getRemoteIP

      public static String getRemoteIP()
      Gets the IP address of the originator of the current servlet request.
      Returns:
      A string value with the address (null if no IP could be obtained)

    • execRedirect

      public static void execRedirect(String url)
      Performs a redirect to the url passed avoiding any UI rendering (see "Forward and redirect" in ZK developer's reference manual). It is equivalent to calling execRedirect(url, true)
      Parameters:
      url - A String where the browser will be redirected to

    • execRedirect

      public static void execRedirect(String url, boolean voidUI)
      Performs a redirect to the url passed. The boolean parameter determines if the underlying ZK execution can be voided (see "Forward and redirect" in ZK developer's reference manual).
      Parameters:
      url - A String where the browser will be redirected to
      voidUI - Whether to void the execution

    • getQueryParam

      public static String getQueryParam(String param)
      Gets the query parameter whose name is passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      param - Parameter name
      Returns:
      The first value of the named parameter in the request, null if the parameter is not part of it

    • validateImageUrl

      public static String validateImageUrl(String url)
      Reads the contents of the URL passes as param and returns null if the contents received are not image-like (e.g. different file format or HTTP error)
      Parameters:
      url - String with URL to inspect
      Returns:
      The value received in parameter if it points to a valid image, null otherwise

      public static String getFullRequestURL()

    • getValueFromCookie
